about_the_game:
Slime Farm is a CUUUUUTE game about nurturing, playing with, evolving and trading an array of magical slimes.



You'll start with a small patch of land and a couple of basic slimes, but as you learn more about the diverse needs and quirky behaviors of your slimes, you'll unlock the secrets to breeding exotic and rare varieties. Whether you're a seasoned sim player or looking for a relaxing game to unwind with, there's something in Slime Farm Simulator for everyone to love. Join us on this magical journey and create the slime farm of your dreams!

Key Features:

  • Cute Magical Slimes: Discover a world of Elemental slimes. Each slime brings its own charm and joy to your farm, creating a vibrant, magical atmosphere.
  • Engaging Slime Interactions: Experience unique interactions with each slime. Learn their preferences, play with them, and build a farm where happiness and harmony thrive.

  • Elemental Foods: Feed your slimes Elemental Foods like Frostberries and Sunfruits to influence their attributes, moods, and even unlock new evolutions through surprising transformations.
  • Diverse Slime Breeding: Engage in the art of slime breeding to create rare and exotic species. Combine slimes, nurture them, and be amazed by the delightful results..
  • Resource Management: Efficiently manage resources to feed, please, and grow your slime population. Balance food, elemental resources, and space to turn your farm into a thriving haven.
  • Elemental Fountains: Activate Elemental Fountains to attract specific slimes and speed up food growth. Each fountain enhances your farm with Fire, Water, Earth, or Nature energy.

Slime Farm is your gateway to an enchanting adventure of farming, where magic and cute slimes make every day extraordinary. Ready for the magic?
